error.message: Parameter $database of method Drupal\media_sitemap\Controller\MediaSitemapBatchController::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Database\Driver\mysql\Connection. Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:11.0.0. The MySQL database driver has been moved to the mysql module.

Parameter $database of method Drupal\media_sitemap\Controller\MediaSitemapController::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Database\Driver\mysql\Connection. Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:11.0.0. The MySQL database driver has been moved to the mysql module.

Parameter $database of method Drupal\media_sitemap\MediaSitemapGenerator::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Database\Driver\mysql\Connection. Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:11.0.0. The MySQL database driver has been moved to the mysql module.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
